title: Skin Giveaway every 3 wins in a row

embed.description: Support main, Skin giveaway every 4 wins in a row.

body:
Trying to build my up my stream. Doing a little marketing. Got the day off and plan to stream most the day. Giving away a skin every 3 wins in a row I get. Feel free to come say hi!

EDIT: the link says 4, it was 4, but I'm feeling generous today and it is 3 wins = giveaway.
